com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.textindex.query.search

Class FindSimilarServiceImpl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.textindex.query.search.FindSimilarServiceImpl<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The desired return type of the service
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FindSimilarService<T>

    public class FindSimilarServiceImpl<T>
extends Object
implements FindSimilarService<T>
    Default implementation of FindSimilarService

    If you don't need a custom return type use the documentsService(HodServiceConfig) static factory
